recommendations.title: Implement HSTS
recommendations.description: Add Strict-Transport-Security header to enforce HTTPS
recommendations.implementation: Add header: Strict-Transport-Security: max-age=31536000; includeSubDomains; preload

recommendations.title: Implement Content Security Policy
recommendations.description: Add CSP header to prevent XSS and data injection attacks
recommendations.implementation: Add header: Content-Security-Policy with appropriate directives

recommendations.title: Implement X-Frame-Options
recommendations.description: Add X-Frame-Options header to prevent clickjacking

recommendations.title: Implement X-Content-Type-Options
recommendations.description: Add X-Content-Type-Options header to prevent MIME sniffing
